resources.string: Failed to send door open request
Sending the door opening request failed, please check your network settings or contact the administrator.

A door opening request has been sent to the server, and your operation will be recorded on the server. Please do not submit the request repeatedly. If the door does not open, please confirm whether your key is registered or contact the administrator.
Please use other methods to open the door midnight. Your actions will be recorded on the server, please do not submit requests maliciously.

There is no key locally. Please click \"Generate\" below to generate a key. After generating the key, please contact the administrator to register. You can view the key again in the settings in the upper right corner. It takes a certain amount of time to generate the key, and the software is not stuck. The specific time depends on your mobile phone configuration.
Generated success! Please copy the public key and recorded it on server.
The key is valid for 6 months, please re-register after expiration.
Please verify your identity to confirm the operation. Your actions will be recorded on the server, please do not send the door open request maliciously.
